title: gAndhijiyAi
sahitya:
gAndhijiyAi vandavataritta kaNNan malaraDi paNivOm kaliyil


anupallavi

  vEndar bhOgam turandu gItai shol vEdAnta bOdhanai koNDu bhArata
 viDudalai kaNDa dayALan sarvamata sammatan vinOdan Ezhaip-pangALan


caraNam    kaiyonril rATTinamen cakramEndi ulaga sabhaiyil bhArata
 dEvi mAnam vaLarttAL maTroru kaiyyil satyAgraha sangamEndi
 sutantra pOrk-kaLattilE madhura jaya ghOSam sheidaruL
